about_the_game:
The Lady of Midland is gone, and with her, your memories. As her successor, you shall rule in her place – if you can only disguise your amnesia and please your demonic patron. For death is not the price of your failure or disobedience. There are far worse fates for errant souls.

In Demon Kingdom, you will rule a dark fantasy realm where demonic pacts empower nations. Your own patron has her own dark desires. Obey her, solve Midland’s mysteries, and balance the demands of your realm – your very soul depends on it.

Features:
• Rule by swiping left or right to guide Midland towards glory or ruination.
• Hundreds of unique events ensuring no playthrough will be exactly the same.
• Diplomacy with your neighbour states will shape peace and trade in Midland
• A deep dark fantasy mystery to unravel unfolding according to your prior decisions
• Multiple endings for the fate of Midland and your very soul

content_descriptors.notes: Text depiction of violence and sex

name: Demon Kingdom

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: In this interactive dark fantasy adventure, rule alongside your demonic patron. Liberate or crush your subjects, forge alliances with diplomacy or steel, and unravel Midland’s mysteries in a deep story with many endings.
